service.java
mapper.java
mapper.xml
elementList.code:
##引入mybatis支持
$!mybatisSupport

##设置保存名称与保存位置
$!callback.setFileName($tool.append($!{tableInfo.name}, "Mapper.xml"))
$!callback.setSavePath($tool.append($modulePath, $tableInfo.savePath,"/mapper/xml"))

##拿到主键
#if(!$tableInfo.pkColumn.isEmpty())
    #set($pk = $tableInfo.pkColumn.get(0))
#end

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="$!{tableInfo.savePackageName}.mapper.$!{tableInfo.name}Mapper">
    <select id="queryPageList" resultType="$!{tableInfo.savePackageName}.data.vo.$!{tableInfo.name.toLowerCase()}.$!{tableInfo.name}ListVO$Resp">
        select t.* from $!tableInfo.obj.name t
        <where>
            #foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)
            <if test="cond.$column.name!=null and cond.$column.name!=''">and t.$column.name=#{cond.$column.name}</if>
            #end
        </where>
    </select>
    <select id="searchByWord" resultType="$!{tableInfo.savePackageName}.data.vo.$!{tableInfo.name.toLowerCase()}.$!{tableInfo.name}SearchVO$Resp">
        select t.* from $!tableInfo.obj.name t
            
    </select>
    
</mapper>
